description: This file defines a Controller class for managing interactions between a model and a view in a TodoMVC application. It handles event binding, view updates, and data manipulation methods.

classes.name: Controller
classes.description: A controller class that mediates between the model and view, handling user interactions and updating the UI accordingly.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes the controller with model and view, binding view callbacks to controller methods.

methods.name: setView
methods.description: Sets the current view based on the URL hash and updates the filter accordingly.

methods.name: showActive
methods.description: Displays only active (not completed) todo items.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Adds a new todo item with the given title.

methods.name: editItem
methods.description: Enters editing mode for a specific item.

methods.name: editItemSave
methods.description: Saves changes to an item or removes it if the title is empty.

methods.name: editItemCancel
methods.description: Cancels editing mode and restores the original title.

methods.name: toggleComplete
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of an item.

methods.name: _updateCount
methods.description: Updates UI elements based on the count of remaining todos.

methods.name: _filter
methods.description: Filters todo items based on the current route and force parameter.

methods.name: _updateFilter
methods.description: Updates the filter navigation state and triggers filtering.
